casebody.data:
Cheri Joyner STALLINGS
v.
Jeffrey Driver STALLINGS. No. 433P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Marcia H. Armstrong, Smithfield, for Stallings, Jeffrey Driver. Elizabeth B. McKinney, for Stallings, Cheri Joyner. Thomas R. Sallenger, Wilson, for Stallings, Cheri Joyner. I. Joe Ivey, Wilson, for Stallings, Cheri Joyner. L. Lamar Armstrong, Jr., Smithfield, for Stallings, Jeffrey Driver. L. Lamar Armstrong, III, for Stallings, Jeffrey Driver.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd of December 2015 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
